text: ve log ghaate mein pade, jinhonne allaah se milane ko jhuthalaaya, yahaan tak ki jab achaanak unapar vah ghadee aa jaegee to ve kahenge, "haay! afasos, us kotaahee par jo isake vishay mein hamase huee." aur haal yah hoga ki ve apane bojh apanee peethon par uthae honge. dekho, kitana bura bojh hai jo ye uthae hue hai
